mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (guid, customer_name, amount, product_name, quantity, status) VALUES (#{guid}, #{customerName}, #{amount}, #{productName}, #{quantity}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, guid, customer_name as customerName, amount, product_name as productName, quantity, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM orders WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, guid, customer_name as customerName, amount, product_name as productName, quantity, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM orders ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET customer_name = #{customerName}, amount = #{amount}, product_name = #{productName}, quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
